title: Downtown - 1 Bedroom Apartment
posting_body: Located in the heart of downtown.
Easy access to all the bars and restaurants as well as a quick walk to your groceries and coffee.
Complex comes equipped with a newly renovated pool and courtyard, bike storage lockers, 24hr fitness center, and more!

Newly renovated units with chef inspired kitchens with stainless steel appliances, built-in wine refrigerator, in-unit washer/dryer, stained concrete flooring, spacious patio/balcony, and 10 foot ceilings.
I am a Realtor/apartment locator in the Austin area.
My services are 100% free, don’t hesitate to give me a call.
If you'd like to learn more about this property, or would like to review other available options, call/text or email me.
Also at Grackle Realty, if looking to buy, we focus on educating renters on how to become home owners.
Follow us on our Instagram to learn more!
*I strive to keep my postings up to date, but pricing and availability are both subject to change.*
